'''RAK''' is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "stretch out, reach".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 382 (RAK-)</ref>
==Derivatives==
*[[Primitive Quendian]] ''<nowiki>*</nowiki>ranku''
**[[Qenya]] ''ranko'' (plural ''ranqi''; "arm")
**[[Old Noldorin]] ''ranko'' (plural ''rankui'')
***[[Noldorin]] ''rhanc'' (plural ''rhenc'', archaic plural ''rhengy''; "arm")
*Primitive Quendian ''<nowiki>*</nowiki>rakmÄ“'' ("fathom")
**Qenya ''rangwe''
**Old Noldorin ''ragme''
***Noldorin ''rhaew''<ref name=LR/>
